statements: SELECT * FROM user_data WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM user_data WHERE gender = 'M';
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name, interests FROM user_data WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM user_data WHERE gender = 'F' AND interests LIKE '%sports%';
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM user_data WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35;
SELECT * FROM user_data WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'M' ORDER BY last_name ASC
SELECT first_name, last_name, interests FROM user_data WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 35 ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT user_id, first_name, behavior FROM user_data WHERE interests LIKE '%travel%'
SELECT * FROM user_data WHERE gender = 'F' OR interests LIKE '%reading%'
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name, age, gender FROM user_data WHERE age < 25
SELECT * FROM demographics;
SELECT age, gender FROM demographics WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM interests_behavior;
SELECT user_id, interest, behavior FROM interests_behavior WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT user_id, age, location FROM demographics WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT user_id, age, gender, location FROM demographics WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC, gender ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT user_id, location, gender, age FROM demographics WHERE gender = 'Male' OR gender = 'Female' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM interests_behavior WHERE interest LIKE '%sports%' OR behavior = 'active' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, behavior, interest FROM interests_behavior WHERE user_id IN (SELECT user_id FROM demographics WHERE age < 25) ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT user_id, gender, interest FROM demographics INNER JOIN interests_behavior ON demographics.user_id = interests_behavior.user_id ORDER BY demographics.age DESC, interests_behavior.interest ASC;
SELECT * FROM demographics ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT user_id, age, gender FROM demographics WHERE location='New York';
SELECT user_id, user_interest FROM interests ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM behavior WHERE page_views > 100;
SELECT user_id, last_login FROM behavior WHERE last_login < '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, age, gender, location FROM demographics WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC, gender ASC

SELECT behavior.user_id, behavior.last_login, COUNT(behavior.page_views) AS total_page_views FROM behavior GROUP BY behavior.user_id HAVING COUNT(behavior.page_views) > 10 ORDER BY total_page_views DESC
SELECT demographics.*, interests.user_interest FROM demographics JOIN interests ON demographics.user_id = interests.user_id ORDER BY demographics.user_id ASC
SELECT behavior.user_id, MAX(behavior.page_views) AS max_page_views FROM behavior GROUP BY behavior.user_id HAVING MAX(behavior.page_views) > 50 ORDER BY max_page_views DESC
SELECT AVG(age) AS average_age, SUM(page_views) AS total_page_views FROM demographics JOIN behavior ON demographics.user_id = behavior.user_id WHERE gender = 'Female'
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT name, age FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT user_id, location FROM users WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT user_id, interest_category, interest_level FROM interests ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, occupation, income FROM demographics WHERE income > 50000;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, age, gender FROM users INNER JOIN demographics ON users.user_id = demographics.user_id WHERE occupation = 'Engineer';
SELECT user_id, interest_category, interest_level FROM interests WHERE interest_level >= 3 ORDER BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, occupation, income, education_level FROM demographics WHERE income > 50000 AND education_level = 'Bachelor';
SELECT u.name, b.click_count, b.purchase_count FROM users u INNER JOIN behavior b ON u.user_id = b.user_id ORDER BY b.last_visit DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM users;
SELECT user_id, gender, location FROM users;
SELECT * FROM demographics;
SELECT marital_status, employment_status FROM demographics;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY first_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name, gender FROM users WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT user_id, income, marital_status FROM demographics WHERE income > 50000 AND marital_status = 'Married';
SELECT user_id, hobbies, favorite_books, favorite_movies FROM interests WHERE hobbies LIKE '%travel%';
SELECT user_id, login_count, last_login FROM behavior WHERE login_count > 10 ORDER BY last_login DESC;
